name: Sonic Vital 2 Ultrasound Unit
descr:
The Sonic vital 2 is one of the best price quality ultrasound therapy unit in its field. This lightweight unit with 2 channels is very good as portable treatment unit.
The Sonic vital 2 is ergonomically designed with a single pressure button/rotating know for the selection of all parameters.

The Sonic vital hs the following features:
60 fixed program
Editing mode with 60 client defined programs
2 connectors for inserting 2 sizes of treatment heads 1 MHz and 3 MHz
Contact control on treatment head and on the unit
Waterproof ultrasound heads
Blue LEDs for execellent visualisation
Including a hardtop case for easy transportation
